text: Seiji Kobayashi (小林 誠司, born June 7, 1989) is a Japanese professional baseball catcher for the Yomiuri Giants of Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB). ==Career== Kobayashi attended Doshisha University, where he played for the school's baseball team.
